title: Felon - S2E4 - Tracey Wigginton
description:
In the early hours of the 22nd of October 1989, Steven Kerin was rowing in the waters of the Brisbane river. It was earlier than normal for him and he was the only person out on the water. With each pull of the oars he skimmed across the peaceful water’s surface… but the peacefulness of the morning would soon be swept away by a gruesome discovery.
Outro Piano: Katie C Instagram: @naarasleijona
